Class DownloadsController

java.lang.Object
cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.controller.DownloadsController
public class DownloadsController extends Object
Controller that manages the "Downloads" screen: local scan, cloud listing, filtering, selection UX and cloud sync actions.

Main responsibilities

  • Local library: scans the configured downloads folder and builds a list of ResourceDownloaded items.
  • Cloud library: fetches remote media using MediaPolling.getAllMedia() and keeps an in-memory list of Media.
  • State reconciliation: computes a ResourceState per file name: LOCAL_ONLY, CLOUD_ONLY or BOTH.
  • Filters: applies UI filters (type + this week) and a view mode (LOCAL / CLOUD / ALL).
  • UX: keeps selection stable across refreshes, updates metadata table, enables/disables action buttons correctly, supports double-click open.
  • Actions: delete local file, download from cloud, upload to cloud.

Threading

  • Local scan and cloud loading run in background using SwingWorker.
  • All Swing UI changes must occur on the EDT (most callbacks in SwingWorker already are).

Important data structures

  • allResources: master list of local resources (results of scanning disk).
  • cloudMedia: master list of cloud resources (results of API call).
  • downloadsModel: the visible list model after applying filters and view mode.
  • stateByFileName: reconciliation map (normalized filename -> state).

Key normalization: file names are normalized to lowercase and trimmed so that local and cloud entries can be matched reliably.

  • Constructor Details

    • DownloadsController

      public DownloadsController(DefaultListModel<ResourceDownloaded> downloadsModel, List<ResourceDownloaded> allResources, JComboBox<String> cmbTipo, JCheckBox chkSemana, JList<ResourceDownloaded> downloadsList, MetadataTableModel metaModel, JButton btnDelete, JButton btnDownloadFromCloud, JButton btnUploadFromLocal, MediaPolling mediaPolling, JLabel lblStatusScan, JProgressBar pbDownload)
      Creates a DownloadsController and wires it with the UI components it controls.

      This constructor also installs:

      • a selection listener to update metadata and enable/disable actions
      • a double-click handler to open local files with the system player
      • a cell renderer that visually indicates ResourceState
      • hover support and progress bar styling
      Parameters:
      downloadsModel - list model bound to the JList
      allResources - master local resource list
      cmbTipo - filter combo box (type)
      chkSemana - filter checkbox (week)
      downloadsList - list UI component
      metaModel - table model showing metadata of selected resource
      btnDelete - delete action button
      btnDownloadFromCloud - cloud download action button
      btnUploadFromLocal - cloud upload action button
      mediaPolling - API facade used for cloud operations
      lblStatusScan - status label
      pbDownload - progress bar used to show busy state
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if mediaPolling is null

  • Method Details

    • appStart

      public void appStart(Path downloadsDir, Component parentForDialog)
      Initializes the downloads screen when the application starts.

      Flow:

      1. Loads cloud media (if there is an active token).
      2. If the local downloads directory is valid, scans it.
      3. If local directory is invalid, clears local state and refreshes the view.
      Parameters:
      downloadsDir - local directory to scan (may be null)
      parentForDialog - parent component used for modal dialogs

    • scanDownloads

      public void scanDownloads(Path downloadsDir, JButton btnScan)
      Scans the local downloads directory in background.

      Uses DownloadsScanner to build a list of ResourceDownloaded. After finishing, the controller updates internal state and refreshes the list view.

      Parameters:
      downloadsDir - directory to scan
      btnScan - optional scan button to disable while scanning (may be null)

    • deleteSelectedDownloadFile

      public void deleteSelectedDownloadFile(Component parentForDialog)
      Deletes the currently selected local file from disk (if it exists).

      If the resource is local-only, it is removed from the visible model. If the resource exists in cloud too (BOTH), it remains visible as cloud-only.

      After deletion, the controller triggers:

      • a rescan of the local folder (if configured)
      • a cloud reload to recompute states
      • a selection restore to keep UX stable
      Parameters:
      parentForDialog - parent component used for confirmation and info dialogs

    • downloadFromCloud

      public void downloadFromCloud(Component parent)
      Downloads a cloud-only media item to the local downloads directory.

      This method:

      • Validates that selection exists and is CLOUD_ONLY
      • Downloads the file in background via MediaPolling.download(int, File)
      • Refreshes local scan to make the resource appear as local/both
      Parameters:
      parent - parent component for dialogs

    • uploadToCloud

      public void uploadToCloud(Component parent)
      Uploads a local-only item to the cloud.

      Valid only when the selected resource exists on disk and is not already present in cloud.

      Parameters:
      parent - parent component for dialogs

    • canUpload

      public boolean canUpload(ResourceDownloaded r)
      Checks if a resource is eligible to be uploaded to cloud.

      A resource can be uploaded only if:

      • it has a valid local route
      • the file exists on disk
      • it is not already in cloud (not CLOUD_ONLY/BOTH)
      Parameters:
      r - resource to check
      Returns:
      true if upload is allowed

    • applyFiltersIfReady

      public void applyFiltersIfReady()
      Applies filters only when the data required for the current view mode is ready.

      LOCAL view requires a completed local scan. CLOUD/ALL can refresh anytime.

    • onScanStarted

      public void onScanStarted()
      Callback invoked when local scan starts. Sets flags and updates the status label.

    • onScanFinished

      public void onScanFinished(List<ResourceDownloaded> lista)
      Callback invoked when local scan finishes successfully.

      Updates master list, recomputes states, refreshes view and updates scan status message. Also computes a delta against previous scan (+added / -removed) to show a helpful message.

      Parameters:
      lista - scanned local resources

    • refreshScanStatusLabel

      public void refreshScanStatusLabel()
      Refreshes the scan status label with the last stored message. Useful if the status label is recreated or UI is refreshed.

    • onDownloadCompleted

      public void onDownloadCompleted(String fileNameJustDownloaded)
      Callback invoked after a download finishes successfully (local or cloud).

      Recomputes local/cloud states, refreshes the model and tries to keep the UX stable by selecting the item that has just been downloaded.

      Parameters:
      fileNameJustDownloaded - file name (or path-derived name) to select

    • loadCloudMedia

      public void loadCloudMedia(Component parentForDialog)
      Loads cloud media list in background (requires a valid token).

      If there is no token, the method returns without doing anything. This prevents unauthorized calls before login.

      After loading:

      • cloudMedia list is replaced
      • recomputeStates() is executed
      • filters are applied and list repainted
      Parameters:
      parentForDialog - parent component for error dialogs
